title: Architecture job opportunities at 20 women-led firms across the country
author: Nathaniel Bahadursingh
excerpt: Our latest weekly curated jobs roundup from the Archinect Job board features a variety of exciting architecture and design job opportunities at 20 women-led firms. To see and keep up with the range of roles at firms run by or founded/owned by women, use our Diverse Ownership filters or this direct...
text: Our latest weekly curated jobs roundup from the Archinect Job board features a variety of exciting architecture and design job opportunities at 20 women-led firms. To see and keep up with the range of roles at firms run by or founded/owned by women, use our Diverse Ownership filters or this direct link. And, make sure to visit Archinect Jobs for the complete list of positions. To study up on specific job titles from the architectural profession, consult Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series. Also, follow our Archinect Tips series to improve your portfolio, resume, interviewing skills, and increase your overall chances of getting that next job. Selldorf Architects seeks an Interior Designer in New York CityQualifications include at least five to six years of experience, proficiency with AutoCAD, Revit, Adobe Creative Suite, Microsoft Office Suite, and Studio Designer, business and management acumen, a knowledge of furniture, strong oral and written communication skills, and strong organizational skills. 200 Eleventh Avenue by Selldorf Architects. Photo © DavidSundberg lEstoORA seeks an Intermediate Designer and an Intermediate Interior Designer in Los Angeles Intermediate Designer details: Qualifications include three to seven years of experience, experience with Revit, AutoCAD, and SketchUp, experience in completing every phase of residential and/or commercial or hospitality projects, zoning and code knowledge, including permitting experience, and the ability to self-manage projects. Intermediate Interior Designer details: Qualifications include four to seven years of experience, experience with Revit, AutoCAD, and SketchUp, code knowledge and permitting experience, design coordination experience with vendors, fabricators, and owners, and experience with FF&E selections, custom detail development, and procurement. Art Barn by ORA.Colleen Healey Architecture seeks a Staff Designer in Washington, DC"Colleen Healey Architecture is a national award-winning design firm that is seeking a full-time Staff Designer with 2-5 years of experience and demonstrated interest in custom modern residential design. This role entails engaging with clients, developing designs, and preparing design and technical drawings at all project stages. Staff Designers support 3-4 projects at a time. Ideal candidates are organized, collaborative individuals with strong design, technical, and professional skills. Our studio uses Archicad as our BIM platform. Proficiency in Photoshop, InDesign, and Illustrator is required." NICOLEHOLLIS seeks a Product Designer (Interiors) in San Francisco"The Product Designer will be responsible for concept development, sketching, and creating detailed technical drawings as well as collaborating with makers to ensure a smooth production process and maintaining quality standards. The ideal candidate is a great communicator, is up to date on market trends & customer preferences, and has intimate knowledge of the product development process of luxury furniture, accessories and art. They should be excited to join a collaborative and diverse team of talented professionals who work on a wide range of home decor products." Russian Hill Townhouse by NICOLEHOLLIS.Sage and Coombe Architects seeks a Project Architect in New York City"We are seeking a Project Architect with 6-8 years of experience committed to design innovation, building craft, and environmental stewardship. Interested individuals should be self-directed, thoughtful designers with excellent conceptual design, communication, and technical skills and a curiosity to learn and grow professionally. This position involves design, documentation, production as well as construction administration. Successful candidates will be able to mentor junior team members and maintain relationships with clients and consultants." Bunch Design seeks a Project Manager and an Intermediate Designer in Los Angeles Project Manager details: Qualifications include six to ten years of experience, experience in custom design residential projects, exceptional organizational skills and an interest in systems and efficiency, strong problem-solving skills, excellent communication skills, and the capability of taking direction and initiative with minimal supervision. Intermediate Designer details: Qualifications include five to six years of experience, fluency In CAD, SketchUp, V-Ray, and Adobe Creative Suite, experience in custom design residential projects, strong communication skills, and the capability of taking direction and initiative with minimal supervision. Silverlake ADU by Bunch Design.Dattner Architects seeks a Project Architect - Transit and Infrastructure, a Project Architect - Public Projects, and a Marketing Coordinator in New York City Project Architect - Transit and Infrastructure details: "We are seeking a highly motivated and experience Project Architect to join our studio that focuses on transit, infrastructure, and other civic projects. The candidate would lead teams on all phases of projects from design to construction. Previous experience with large civic projects and urban infrastructure including construction documentation and administration in the New York area is highly preferred." Project Architect - Public Projects details: Qualifications include seven to ten years of experience, proficiency with Revit, a functional knowledge of AutoCAD, Rhino, and Adobe Creative Suite, experience working on public, education, or cultural projects, experience developing CD sets, and exceptional written and verbal communication skills. Marketing Coordinator details: "The selected candidate will develop and coordinate marketing initiatives including proposals, presentations, social media, print and digital marketing material, award submissions, website maintenance, and often a combination of these. They will be a key partner in maintaining day-to-day operations of the Department. Our marketing coordinators work together and independently, often directly with firm leadership as well as design staff to bring marketing efforts to realization." Curtis + Ginsberg Architects seeks an Intermediate Architect, a Junior Architect, and a Graphic Coordinator in New York City Intermediate Architect details: "C+GA is currently seeking a candidate for Intermediate Architect with a minimum of 5-7 years of experience, experience working in rehabilitation of existing buildings, and expertise in Building Information Modeling. US experience required." Junior Architect details: "C+GA is currently seeking a candidate for Intermediate Junior Architect with a minimum of 2-3 years of experience." Qualifications include proficiency with Revit and Adobe Creative Suite, as well as 3D proficiency, strong organizational, communication, and design skills, and excellent project delivery experience. Graphic Coordinator details: "C+GA is seeking an intrepid, organized, and detail-oriented Graphic Coordinator with a knack for creativity and a background in the architectural and design industry to join our team. You will collaborate with design teams and our Marketing department to amplify the firm’s mission and values by developing hi-quality graphic marketing collateral, including proposals, presentations, award submissions and competition entries; and support architectural teams on graphic representation of projects, and establishing templates." The Equity Project Charter School by Curtis + Ginsberg Architects.Architectural Resources Group seeks an Intermediate Preservation Architect in Portland, OregonQualifications include five-plus years of experience, proficiency with Revit, AutoCAD, Photoshop, InDesign, SketchUp, and Microsoft Office, experience in the technical aspects of historic properties and material conservation, and experience in historic preservation, including historic research, building assessments, construction documents, and report writing. Matter Studio seeks a Senior Project Architect in Los Angeles"The Senior Architect will lead design and documentation efforts on custom residential projects from concept through construction. This role requires both creative and technical leadership, with a strong grasp of permitting processes, construction documentation, and client coordination. You will work closely with principals, clients, consultants, and city agencies to deliver refined, buildable designs." Kostow Greenwood Architects seeks a Junior Architect / Designer and an Architect / Designer in New York City Junior Architect / Designer details: Qualifications include one to three years of experience, experience with AutoCAD, Revit, 3D modeling, Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign, ability to work across all phases of project development, and strong graphic, verbal, and written communication skills. Architect / Designer details: Qualifications include five to seven years of experience, experience with AutoCAD, Revit, 3D modeling, Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign, the ability to produce and manage complex drawing sets with minimal supervision, a knowledge of NYC building codes, ADA, zoning, and the filing/review process, and strong interpersonal skills to manage team dynamics. Fir Tree Partners - Miami by Kostow Greenwood Architects.FE seeks a Project Architect in Brooklyn"FE is seeking a Project Architect with a minimum of 6 years in professional practice to join our Brooklyn, NY studio. The successful applicant will collaborate closely with the partners and design staff across all aspects of the practice, including both design and management. The position involves taking on a leadership role in structuring and tracking project deliverables, guiding internal reviews, and maintaining regular communication with consultant teams as well as clients." Studio SFW seeks a Senior Project Architect in New York City"Studio SFW, a Manhattan-based collaborative architecture and interior design studio, is seeking a Senior Project Architect with 8+ years of experience in high-end residential design to join our team. [...] Candidates should have relevant experience in architectural detailing, project management, exhibit strong design and organizational skills, and be able to contribute to a fast-paced, creative office." Cottage in Amagansett by Studio SFW.Lara Apelian Studio seeks an Intermediate Architect in New York City"Lara Apelian Studio is currently seeking a project architect with a minimum of 5 years of experience to work on high end residential projects." Qualifications include proficiency with AutoCAD, Adobe Creative Suite, SketchUp or Rhino, and Microsoft Office, along with excellent communication and organizational skills. Mammoth seeks a Project Designer in Brooklyn"Mammoth, a Brooklyn-based Design-Build Studio is seeking a Project Designer (2-5 years experience) to join our team. [...] The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, detail-oriented, and a creative individual who values clear and open communication. Please be highly proficient in some combination of AutoCAD, Revit, and Photoshop." Burr Salvatore Architects seeks a Project Architect in Darien, ConnecticutQualifications include a minimum of eight-plus years of experience, fluency in CAD and a familiarity with Revit, and proficiency with high-end, single-family residential detailing. Downey seeks a Senior Interior Designer in New York City"The ideal candidate has exceptional technical skills, a sharp eye for detail, and the ability to translate creative vision into beautifully executed projects. They thrive in a fast-paced, detail-oriented environment and bring expertise across all phases of the design process. This person is eager to contribute to sophisticated, large-scale residential work while continuing to grow within a dynamic team." Upper West Side Townhouse by Downey.NCA Studio seeks a Project Coordinator in Los Angeles"We are seeking a full-time, in person Project Coordinator who has experience in commercial design, coordinating consultants, construction document production, construction administration and excellent communications skills. Candidates should be design-sensitive, flexible, collaborative, and able to generate drawings using Revit and AutoCAD programs." Megan Grehl seeks an Interior Designer in New York City"Megan Grehl is looking for an interior designer with one to five years of experience to join its practice in New York. [...] We are seeking a designer who has experience in project management and can work independently. You must have an entrepreneurial mindset and the ability to thrive in a smaller office setting. Emphasis on residential design and FF&E. If you have previous experience in construction management and dealt with contractors and vendors a major plus." Paris Pied-à-Terre by Megan Grehl.Jackson Liles Architecture seeks a Project Architect, a Designer/Architect, and a Designer in San Francisco Project Architect details: "Jackson Liles Architecture (JLA) is seeking a talented and technically proficient Project Architect with 8–12 years of professional experience to join our collaborative and dynamic team." Qualifications include advanced skills in Revit, Bluebeam, Adobe Creative Suite, and Microsoft Office and proven experience producing and coordinating Construction Documents with internal and consultant team members. Designer/Architect details: "Jackson Liles Architecture is looking for a talented Architect/ Designer with 3 to 5 years of professional experience to join our team." Qualifications include three to five years of experience, advanced skills in Revit and Adobe Creative Suite, experience with Construction Document production, and outstanding written and verbal communication skills. Designer details: "Jackson Liles Architecture is looking for a talented Designer with 1 to 3 years of professional experience to join our team." Qualifications include one to three years of experience, proficiency with Revit and Adobe Creative Suite, design sensibility and enthusiasm for collaboration, and excellent organizational and communication skills. If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
html:
Our latest weekly curated jobs roundup from the Archinect Job board features a variety of exciting architecture and design job opportunities at 20 women-led firms.

To see and keep up with the range of roles at firms run by or founded/owned by women, use our Diverse Ownership filters or this direct link. And, make sure to visit Archinect Jobs for the complete list of positions.

To study up on specific job titles from the architectural profession, consult Archinect's Guide to Job Titles series. Also, follow our Archinect Tips series to improve your portfolio, resume, interviewing skills, and increase your overall chances of getting that next job.

Selldorf Architects seeks an Interior Designer in New York City
Qualifications include at least five to six years of experience, proficiency with AutoCAD, Revit, Adobe Creative Suite, Microsoft Office Suite, and Studio Designer, business and management acumen, a knowledge of furniture, strong oral and written communication skills, and strong organizational skills.

ORA seeks an Intermediate Designer and an Intermediate Interior Designer in Los Angeles

Intermediate Designer details: Qualifications include three to seven years of experience, experience with Revit, AutoCAD, and SketchUp, experience in completing every phase of residential and/or commercial or hospitality projects, zoning and code knowledge, including permitting experience, and the ability to self-manage projects.

Intermediate Interior Designer details: Qualifications include four to seven years of experience, experience with Revit, AutoCAD, and SketchUp, code knowledge and permitting experience, design coordination experience with vendors, fabricators, and owners, and experience with FF&E selections, custom detail development, and procurement.

Colleen Healey Architecture seeks a Staff Designer in Washington, DC
"Colleen Healey Architecture is a national award-winning design firm that is seeking a full-time Staff Designer with 2-5 years of experience and demonstrated interest in custom modern residential design. This role entails engaging with clients, developing designs, and preparing design and technical drawings at all project stages. Staff Designers support 3-4 projects at a time. Ideal candidates are organized, collaborative individuals with strong design, technical, and professional skills. Our studio uses Archicad as our BIM platform. Proficiency in Photoshop, InDesign, and Illustrator is required."

NICOLEHOLLIS seeks a Product Designer (Interiors) in San Francisco
"The Product Designer will be responsible for concept development, sketching, and creating detailed technical drawings as well as collaborating with makers to ensure a smooth production process and maintaining quality standards. The ideal candidate is a great communicator, is up to date on market trends & customer preferences, and has intimate knowledge of the product development process of luxury furniture, accessories and art. They should be excited to join a collaborative and diverse team of talented professionals who work on a wide range of home decor products."

Sage and Coombe Architects seeks a Project Architect in New York City
"We are seeking a Project Architect with 6-8 years of experience committed to design innovation, building craft, and environmental stewardship. Interested individuals should be self-directed, thoughtful designers with excellent conceptual design, communication, and technical skills and a curiosity to learn and grow professionally. This position involves design, documentation, production as well as construction administration. Successful candidates will be able to mentor junior team members and maintain relationships with clients and consultants."

Bunch Design seeks a Project Manager and an Intermediate Designer in Los Angeles

Project Manager details: Qualifications include six to ten years of experience, experience in custom design residential projects, exceptional organizational skills and an interest in systems and efficiency, strong problem-solving skills, excellent communication skills, and the capability of taking direction and initiative with minimal supervision.

Intermediate Designer details: Qualifications include five to six years of experience, fluency In CAD, SketchUp, V-Ray, and Adobe Creative Suite, experience in custom design residential projects, strong communication skills, and the capability of taking direction and initiative with minimal supervision.

Dattner Architects seeks a Project Architect - Transit and Infrastructure, a Project Architect - Public Projects, and a Marketing Coordinator in New York City

Project Architect - Transit and Infrastructure details: "We are seeking a highly motivated and experience Project Architect to join our studio that focuses on transit, infrastructure, and other civic projects. The candidate would lead teams on all phases of projects from design to construction. Previous experience with large civic projects and urban infrastructure including construction documentation and administration in the New York area is highly preferred."

Project Architect - Public Projects details: Qualifications include seven to ten years of experience, proficiency with Revit, a functional knowledge of AutoCAD, Rhino, and Adobe Creative Suite, experience working on public, education, or cultural projects, experience developing CD sets, and exceptional written and verbal communication skills.

Marketing Coordinator details: "The selected candidate will develop and coordinate marketing initiatives including proposals, presentations, social media, print and digital marketing material, award submissions, website maintenance, and often a combination of these. They will be a key partner in maintaining day-to-day operations of the Department. Our marketing coordinators work together and independently, often directly with firm leadership as well as design staff to bring marketing efforts to realization."

Curtis + Ginsberg Architects seeks an Intermediate Architect, a Junior Architect, and a Graphic Coordinator in New York City

Intermediate Architect details: "C+GA is currently seeking a candidate for Intermediate Architect with a minimum of 5-7 years of experience, experience working in rehabilitation of existing buildings, and expertise in Building Information Modeling. US experience required."

Junior Architect details: "C+GA is currently seeking a candidate for Intermediate Junior Architect with a minimum of 2-3 years of experience." Qualifications include proficiency with Revit and Adobe Creative Suite, as well as 3D proficiency, strong organizational, communication, and design skills, and excellent project delivery experience.

Graphic Coordinator details: "C+GA is seeking an intrepid, organized, and detail-oriented Graphic Coordinator with a knack for creativity and a background in the architectural and design industry to join our team. You will collaborate with design teams and our Marketing department to amplify the firm’s mission and values by developing hi-quality graphic marketing collateral, including proposals, presentations, award submissions and competition entries; and support architectural teams on graphic representation of projects, and establishing templates."

Architectural Resources Group seeks an Intermediate Preservation Architect in Portland, Oregon
Qualifications include five-plus years of experience, proficiency with Revit, AutoCAD, Photoshop, InDesign, SketchUp, and Microsoft Office, experience in the technical aspects of historic properties and material conservation, and experience in historic preservation, including historic research, building assessments, construction documents, and report writing.

Matter Studio seeks a Senior Project Architect in Los Angeles
"The Senior Architect will lead design and documentation efforts on custom residential projects from concept through construction. This role requires both creative and technical leadership, with a strong grasp of permitting processes, construction documentation, and client coordination. You will work closely with principals, clients, consultants, and city agencies to deliver refined, buildable designs."

Kostow Greenwood Architects seeks a Junior Architect / Designer and an Architect / Designer in New York City

Junior Architect / Designer details: Qualifications include one to three years of experience, experience with AutoCAD, Revit, 3D modeling, Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign, ability to work across all phases of project development, and strong graphic, verbal, and written communication skills.

Architect / Designer details: Qualifications include five to seven years of experience, experience with AutoCAD, Revit, 3D modeling, Illustrator, Photoshop, and InDesign, the ability to produce and manage complex drawing sets with minimal supervision, a knowledge of NYC building codes, ADA, zoning, and the filing/review process, and strong interpersonal skills to manage team dynamics.

FE seeks a Project Architect in Brooklyn
"FE is seeking a Project Architect with a minimum of 6 years in professional practice to join our Brooklyn, NY studio. The successful applicant will collaborate closely with the partners and design staff across all aspects of the practice, including both design and management. The position involves taking on a leadership role in structuring and tracking project deliverables, guiding internal reviews, and maintaining regular communication with consultant teams as well as clients."

Studio SFW seeks a Senior Project Architect in New York City
"Studio SFW, a Manhattan-based collaborative architecture and interior design studio, is seeking a Senior Project Architect with 8+ years of experience in high-end residential design to join our team. [...] Candidates should have relevant experience in architectural detailing, project management, exhibit strong design and organizational skills, and be able to contribute to a fast-paced, creative office."

Lara Apelian Studio seeks an Intermediate Architect in New York City
"Lara Apelian Studio is currently seeking a project architect with a minimum of 5 years of experience to work on high end residential projects." Qualifications include proficiency with AutoCAD, Adobe Creative Suite, SketchUp or Rhino, and Microsoft Office, along with excellent communication and organizational skills.

Mammoth seeks a Project Designer in Brooklyn
"Mammoth, a Brooklyn-based Design-Build Studio is seeking a Project Designer (2-5 years experience) to join our team. [...] The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, detail-oriented, and a creative individual who values clear and open communication. Please be highly proficient in some combination of AutoCAD, Revit, and Photoshop."

Burr Salvatore Architects seeks a Project Architect in Darien, Connecticut
Qualifications include a minimum of eight-plus years of experience, fluency in CAD and a familiarity with Revit, and proficiency with high-end, single-family residential detailing.

Downey seeks a Senior Interior Designer in New York City
"The ideal candidate has exceptional technical skills, a sharp eye for detail, and the ability to translate creative vision into beautifully executed projects. They thrive in a fast-paced, detail-oriented environment and bring expertise across all phases of the design process. This person is eager to contribute to sophisticated, large-scale residential work while continuing to grow within a dynamic team."

NCA Studio seeks a Project Coordinator in Los Angeles
"We are seeking a full-time, in person Project Coordinator who has experience in commercial design, coordinating consultants, construction document production, construction administration and excellent communications skills. Candidates should be design-sensitive, flexible, collaborative, and able to generate drawings using Revit and AutoCAD programs."

Megan Grehl seeks an Interior Designer in New York City
"Megan Grehl is looking for an interior designer with one to five years of experience to join its practice in New York. [...] We are seeking a designer who has experience in project management and can work independently. You must have an entrepreneurial mindset and the ability to thrive in a smaller office setting. Emphasis on residential design and FF&E. If you have previous experience in construction management and dealt with contractors and vendors a major plus."

Jackson Liles Architecture seeks a Project Architect, a Designer/Architect, and a Designer in San Francisco

Project Architect details: "Jackson Liles Architecture (JLA) is seeking a talented and technically proficient Project Architect with 8–12 years of professional experience to join our collaborative and dynamic team." Qualifications include advanced skills in Revit, Bluebeam, Adobe Creative Suite, and Microsoft Office and proven experience producing and coordinating Construction Documents with internal and consultant team members.

Designer/Architect details: "Jackson Liles Architecture is looking for a talented Architect/ Designer with 3 to 5 years of professional experience to join our team." Qualifications include three to five years of experience, advanced skills in Revit and Adobe Creative Suite, experience with Construction Document production, and outstanding written and verbal communication skills.

Designer details: "Jackson Liles Architecture is looking for a talented Designer with 1 to 3 years of professional experience to join our team." Qualifications include one to three years of experience, proficiency with Revit and Adobe Creative Suite, design sensibility and enthusiasm for collaboration, and excellent organizational and communication skills.

If you don't already, follow Archinect on Instagram, Facebook, X, Pinterest, LinkedIn, Threads, and BlueSky, as well as on our dedicated Archinect Jobs Instagram, Facebook, X, and Threads feeds.
